credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Monument after Palladio with bust of Palladio and wolf with Romulus and Remus
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with bistre wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
description: Palladian monument consisting of high pedestal. Bust shown.  Figure representing "Painting" shown on palate with nearby representation of Romulus and Remus with she-wolf. "Sculpture" and "Architecture" stand laterally. Three wreaths stand before monument. Verso: woman holding child, stands beside column. Another woman seated at left. Vaulted ceiling indicated. Framing angle at right and left.
name: Drawing
